"Phantom Rifle":
"When a Rifle is equipped by a Phantom, it performs \"Phantom Rifle\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Rifle attacks.

Phantom Rifle is a flexible weapon that can adjust the timing of its PAs by holding the button and releasing it at different times.

Some Phantom Rifle PAs use \"Bits\", which perform their own attacks on a slight delay. To maximise your effectiveness, try to coordinate your attacks with what your Bits are doing."

"Phantom Rifle's Weapon Action fires \"Bits\", which attack enemies indirectly at long range.

You can also charge the Weapon Action to shoot a powerful piercing shot."

"Phantom weapons can turn their PAs into alternate \"Shift PAs\" by using them during a Weapon Action.

These attacks have different properties from normal, so choose which one to use carefully based on your situation.
